item.title: Jamie Dimon turned down Jeff Bezos and a top gig at Amazon to take on ‘troubled’ Bank One in a $60 million bet
item.description: Dimon told the "Acquired" podcast that the version of his life where he moved to Seattle to work at Amazon is an "alternate universe."

item.title: As AI comes for entry-level gigs, Whole Foods exec says the $13.7 billion grocer is reviving artisans with butcher, cheese, and bakery apprenticeships
item.description: About 1,300 Whole Foods employees have been upskilled in an artisan craft from fishmongering to cake decorating, offering unemployed Gen Z an alternat...

item.title: Virtuos helped make one of the year’s best-selling video games. Now, 300 of its workers may be out of a job
item.description: The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered became the third-best-selling video game of 2025 in less than a week.

item.title: Trump’s Coca Cola post tanked share prices for high fructose corn syrup makers
item.description: Shares for Archer-Daniels-Midland and Ingredion both fell at least 6% in after hours trading.

item.title: Slack’s paid users are getting new time-saving AI tools
item.description: Tools are meant to improve productivity.
